name: NodePosition_toStringTest
description: Unit test for the toString method of NodePosition class.

test_cases.name: testToString
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of the NodePosition class, ensuring it returns the expected string representation.

name: Line2D_linesIntersectTest
description: Unit tests for the Line2D.linesIntersect method, which checks if two line segments intersect.

test_cases.name: testLinesIntersectWhenIntersecting
test_cases.description: Tests if the linesIntersect method correctly identifies intersecting line segments.

test_cases.name: testLinesIntersectWhenNotIntersecting
test_cases.description: Tests if the linesIntersect method correctly identifies non-intersecting line segments.

name: ObjectsHelper_asClassTest
description: Unit tests for the ObjectsHelper.asClass method.

test_cases.name: testAsClassWithNullObject
test_cases.description: Tests the asClass method with a null object.

test_cases.name: testAsClassWithMatchingClass
test_cases.description: Tests the asClass method with an object matching the specified class.

test_cases.name: testAsClassWithNonMatchingClass
test_cases.description: Tests the asClass method with an object not matching the specified class.

test_cases.name: coverPrivateConstructor
test_cases.description: Tests the instantiation of ObjectsHelper for test coverage purposes.

name: ImmutableStack_popTest
description: Unit tests for the pop functionality of the ImmutableStack class.

test_cases.name: testPopOnNonEmptyStack
test_cases.description: Tests the pop functionality on a non-empty stack.

test_cases.name: testPopOnSingleElementStack
test_cases.description: Tests the pop functionality on a stack with a single element.

test_cases.name: testPopOnEmptyStackThrowsException
test_cases.description: Tests that pop on an empty stack throws a RuntimeException.

name: Line2D_ptSegDistSqTest
description: Unit tests for the ptSegDistSq method in the Line2D class.

test_cases.name: testPtSegDistSqPointOnSideOfX1Y1
test_cases.description: Tests the ptSegDistSq method with a point on the side of (x1, y1).

test_cases.name: testPtSegDistSqPointOnSideOfX2Y2
test_cases.description: Tests the ptSegDistSq method with a point on the side of (x2, y2).

test_cases.name: testPtSegDistSqPointBetweenX1Y1AndX2Y2
test_cases.description: Tests the ptSegDistSq method with a point between (x1, y1) and (x2, y2).

test_cases.name: testPtSegDistSqPointExactlyOnLineSegment
test_cases.description: Tests the ptSegDistSq method with a point exactly on the line segment.

name: Util_addTest
description: Unit tests for the Util.add method, which adds an element to a list.

test_cases.name: testAddElementToList
test_cases.description: Tests adding an element to a non-empty list.

test_cases.name: testAddElementToEmptyList
test_cases.description: Tests adding an element to an empty list.

test_cases.name: testAddElementToNullList
test_cases.description: Tests adding an element to a null list, expecting a NullPointerException.

test_cases.name: testAddNullElementToList
test_cases.description: Tests adding a null element to a non-empty list.

name: Util_mbrTest
description: Unit tests for the Util.mbr method which calculates the minimum bounding rectangle (MBR) for a collection of geometric items.

test_cases.name: testMbrWithSingleItem
test_cases.description: Tests the calculation of the MBR for a collection containing a single item.

test_cases.name: testMbrWithDoublePrecision
test_cases.description: Tests the calculation of the MBR for a collection containing items with double precision.

test_cases.name: testMbrWithEmptyCollection
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of the MBR calculation when the collection is empty, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.

name: Util_removeTest
description: Unit tests for the Util.remove method, which removes specified elements from a list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAllElements
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of all elements from a list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveSomeElements
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of some elements from a list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveNoElements
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of no elements from a list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveFromEmptyList
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of elements from an empty list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveNonExistentElements
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of non-existent elements from a list.

name: ImmutableStack_peekTest
description: Unit tests for the peek functionality of the ImmutableStack class.

test_cases.name: testPeekOnNonEmptyStack
test_cases.description: Tests the peek functionality on a non-empty stack.

test_cases.name: testPeekOnEmptyStackThrowsException
test_cases.description: Tests that peeking on an empty stack throws a RuntimeException.

test_cases.name: testPeekAfterPush
test_cases.description: Tests the peek functionality after pushing an element onto the stack.

test_cases.name: testPeekAfterPop
test_cases.description: Tests the peek functionality after popping an element from the stack.

test_cases.name: testPeekOnEmptyStackAfterMultiplePops
test_cases.description: Tests that peeking on an empty stack after multiple pops throws a RuntimeException.

name: BoundedPriorityQueue_asOrderedListTest
description: Unit tests for the asOrderedList method of BoundedPriorityQueue.

test_cases.name: testAsOrderedListWithEmptyQueue
test_cases.description: Tests the asOrderedList method when the queue is empty.

test_cases.name: testAsOrderedListWithSingleElement
test_cases.description: Tests the asOrderedList method when the queue contains a single element.

test_cases.name: testAsOrderedListWithMultipleElements
test_cases.description: Tests the asOrderedList method when the queue contains multiple elements.

test_cases.name: testAsOrderedListWithMaxSizeElements
test_cases.description: Tests the asOrderedList method when the queue contains elements up to its maximum size.
